channel.title: Bits to Bytes
channel.description: Recent content on Bits to Bytes

item.title: A Word from our CEO
item.description: Hey, everyone! Developing Bits to Bytes has been one heck of an intense journey for me over the past couple of months. My team and I have iterated over the idea several times and it is fair to say a lot of hard work has gone into this. But what exactly is “this”? Without a doubt, I can confidently say I have a strong passion for science, technology, engineering and maths.

item.title: Dillon de Silva
item.description: Envisioning teams of young people working together to develop educational content and news to inspire other students, Dillon used his technical abilities and leadership talents to help breathe Bits to Bytes to life. In his spare time, Dillon is an avid musician, runner and photographer.

item.title: Jemma Swaak
item.description: Using her amazing networking abilities and writing powers, Jemma helps to connect Bits to Bytes with students/professionals in society. She is a regular contributor to our blog and brings positive vibes to our team. You can often find her skateboarding, sunset watching or socialising with others.

item.title: Morgan Au
item.description: With powerful logistical insights, Morgan works closely with Dillon to ensure initiatives run as smooth as possible. His bold intelligence helps keep our team going. Aside from helping out at Bits to Bytes, Morgan also enjoys hiking, reading and playing video games

item.title: Sofia de Bellis
item.description: With an energetic, can-do attitude, Sofia develops a large portion of the company’s promotional material using a variety of professional tools. She also provides valuable insight to our crew helping us to move forward to reach and inspire audiences. Dancing, ice tea and socialising with friends are just some of the things she loves to get up to away from work.
